00037 typedef struct cstr {
00038     unsigned long int size; 
00039     unsigned long int len; 
00040     char *str; 
00041 } *cstr_t; 
00042

00044 #define CSTR_LEN(X) ((X)->len) 
00045 #define CSTR_STR(X) ((X)->str)
